title: Ep. 807 - The Real Coup
description:
The Chairman of the Joint Chiefs compares Trump supporters to Nazis, new reports out of Georgia raise questions about the 2020 election, and huge swaths of the electorate want to secede.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
